titles.title: I'm Free To Walk Upon The Highest Mountains There May Be

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm free to walk upon
The highest mountain there may be,
I'm free to place my feet
Upon the land and on the sea,
I'm free to manifest
The very image that I am,
I'm free but I'm not loose,
In His kingdom I now stand.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It's good to be free, so good to be free,
No earthly kingdom has a hold on me,
My heavenly Father, He dwells in me,
Oh praise the Lord, it's good to be free.
